Title: Half a Loaf of Kung Fu
Actors: Jackie Chan, Chun-Erh Lung, Cheng-Lan Chin, Chih-Ping Chiang
Plot: Mostly a Kung-fu showcase; a loose script describes Jackie Chan's character learning Kung-fu from a beggar-master and his pupil while guarding a caravan from bandits. Chan's early comedic beginnings are shown here.
